title: Chris Packham's Animal Einsteins
overview: In Animal Einsteins, viewers meet Nature's savviest species who show that brainpower, ingenuity and clever tactics are just as important as brawn in the daily battle for survival.With the help of experts, experiments and the very latest science, Chris Packham shines a light upon some of the smartest creatures and explores what has led them to develop such talents.Each episode explores a very different skill, and showcases the animals that have honed that skill to perfection.
